title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Summerside, PEI, Canada
description:
Global Day of Code Retreat in Summerside, PEI! 
Code Retreat will start sharply at 9am, and will carry on through 5pm. Lunch and beer will be provided. 
At 5pm you are encouraged to join us (in the same place!) for the PEI Developers holiday party. Spouses welcome. This is a hugely informal event, you will be able to order Dinner from the in-house restaurant to be delivered to the room.

Hi gang... just FYI, I can only attend 1/2 day due to family event for the holidays. Excited, though... 
Michael
 
Looking for a group to carpool with from Ch'town to S'side on Saturday, Dec. 14th - message me if you can help me out, thanks!
Ken, check the meetup site.  Matt is willing to take a couple people from Charlottetown. 
http://www.meetup.com/PEI-Developers/events/153214192/
Hey Derek, I just sent Matt an email through MeetUp. I'm just waiting for a phone call from him. 
I appreciate everything you're doing
Brr! Warming up the car now, on my way very shortly.
